prompt:
Please create a list of 1 ideas for types of synthetic tabular data, with descriptions for the data they would contain, and what they might be useful for. Each dataset should be at least somewhat related to logistics.

Each item in the list should follow this format:
* [Name of the dataset] Data: This dataset would contain [description for the data it contains]. It could be used to [what it might be useful for].
response_text: 1. Delivery Route Optimization Data: This dataset would contain information about delivery routes and estimated times of arrival for deliveries based on different route options. It could be used to optimize delivery routes in order to minimize delivery time, reduce fuel costs, and improve customer satisfaction.

dataset_ideas.name: Delivery Route Optimization Data
dataset_ideas.about: information about delivery routes and estimated times of arrival for deliveries based on different route options
dataset_ideas.use_cases: optimize delivery routes in order to minimize delivery time, reduce fuel costs, and improve customer satisfaction
